item.title: Lab Christmas Social 2025
item.description: Kitso lab members spent a fun late afternoon at Munichâ€™s Christmas markets and concluded the evening at a Bavarian Wirtshaus. Merry Christmas!

item.title: Kitso @ LMU RadOnc Octoberfest Social 2025
item.description: Kitso gathered for the Radiation Oncology department’s annual Oktoberfest outing. Great food and even better company to kick off fall!

item.title: 12th Munich Cancer Retreat
item.description: Kristian and lab members attended the 12th Munich Cancer Retreat of the German Cancer Consortium (DKTK). Below are photos of Robert giving a talk and Rosch presenting his poster.

item.title: Lab Christmas Social 2024
item.description: The lab celebrated Advent at a Christmas market.

item.title: 11th Munich Cancer Retreat
item.description: Robert presenting our data on inference of tumor microenvironment subtypes from HPV negative HNSC!

item.title: Radiation Oncology tour
item.description: New and senior KITSO lab members recently gathered at the LMU Hospital’s Department of Radiation Oncology for a tour and detailed explanation of diagnostic and treatment procedures, including MR-guided radiotherapy and other techniques. Many thanks to our clinical colleagues for hosting us!
